title: Pinkbike Digest: Dropper Posts Are Out, Dropper Frames Are In, Plus Why Bernard Kerr’s Prototype Frame Broke at Crankworx Rotorua
content:
Showcasing the top dirt articles from our mountain bike sister-site, Pinkbike. Featuring coverage from racing, tech, and some fun storytelling along the way.

Read the full article at Pinkbike Digest: Dropper Posts Are Out, Dropper Frames Are In, Plus Why Bernard Kerr’s Prototype Frame Broke at Crankworx Rotorua on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
